name: docker-socket-proxy
description: Docker Socket Proxy is a secure proxy for the Docker socket, designed to expose only specific actions through HTTP. It helps isolate and restrict container management operations safely using granular authorization.
features: Secure Socket Access: Safely expose Docker socket over HTTP. Controlled container management.
Granular Authorization: Restrict specific Docker API actions. Fine-grained security control.
Isolation Layer: Protect Docker daemon from direct exposure. Enhanced security posture.
HTTP Proxy: Access Docker operations through standard HTTP. Easy integration.
Permission Control: Define exactly which operations are allowed. Minimize attack surface.
Self-Hosted: Run your own secure Docker proxy. Complete control over access.
